GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.42
GSD.description:
net/mlx5e: Fix null deref accessing lag dev

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.42 by commit 2e4b0b95a489259f9d35a3db17023061f8f3d587, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 7e51891a237f9ea319f53f9beb83afb0077d88e6. For more details please see the references link.
